Params: {3: 'Meanwhile, on the other end of the explosions...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: '...Well, time to look for a way out now.', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Structural damage to multiple supporting columns within the park—'}
{3: '—All personnel are kindly obliged to stay under secure cover, or they might be ineligible for insurance coverage due to injuries or deaths stemming from failure to follow safety procedures—'}
{3: 'As of following the chain of explosions from before, even more explosions reverberate throughout the entire park, accompanied by sounds of structural collapse.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The explosions from those hyenas are causing the whole place to break down!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Direct access is blocked! The only way left is the hidden passage in the Ferris wheel area!', 4: '1'}
